meanings.definition: A genus of twining vines in the dogbane family (Apocynaceae), native to South America.
meanings.english_definition: A genus of twining vines in the dogbane family (Apocynaceae), native to South America.

examples.sentence: Araujia sericifera is considered a weed in many parts of the world.
examples.translation: Araujia sericiferaは世界の多くの地域で雑草とみなされています。

etymology.value: Named after António de Araújo e Azevedo, 1st Count of Barca (1754-1817), a Portuguese botanist.
